name: Ghost Your World
description:
Use the W, A, and D keys to move

Use the up, left, and right arrow keys to control the player's attack

Press the space bar to launch an attack

Press the down key to switch between realms

Player can only interact with enemies in their realms

The smaller enemies with wings and the final enemy are apart of the ghost realm

The enemies with the spikes on their head are apart of the normal realm

The player has a limited amount of time in the ghost realm. They can gain more time by defeating enemies in the normal realm

All enemies expect for the final enemy have three HP.  The final enemy has 20 HP

The final enemy can not take damage unless it is one the ground

Destroy all the enemies in the ghost realm to move forward
